convince.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to make someone feel certain that something is true
convince.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Her arguments didn’t convince everyone, but changes were made.
Baker had to convince jurors that his client had been nowhere near the scene of the murder.
The officials were eager to convince us of the safety of the nuclear reactors.
convince.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to persuade someone to do something
convince.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I’ve been trying to convince Jean to come with me.
